name: Ryuji's Onsen
description:
Play as Ryuji the Dragon from the basement of his onsen where he runs the boilers! But watch the temperature of the water! Too cold and your guests will leave in  shivering, sodden contempt, too hot and you could end up cooking them!

INPUTS: 

TOGGLE CAMERAVFIREQPAUSERMoveWASD
